summary: Design pilot for decentralized TEOF receipt exchange

steps.title: Define pilot scope and success criteria
steps.notes: Defined pilot scope + success criteria in docs/proposals/20250922T190055Z__decentralized-propagation-pilot__draft.md (CMD-1, CMD-3)

steps.title: Prototype cross-node receipt exchange
steps.notes: Added tools/network/receipt_sync.py with tests (tests/test_receipt_sync.py); aggregates multi-node receipts + conflict report (CMD-4, CMD-5)

steps.title: Evaluate reconciliation + risks
steps.notes: Documented synthetic evaluation + risk considerations in proposal draft; aggregator logs conflicts for review (CMD-1, CMD-7)

checkpoint.description: Pilot produces cross-node receipts with reconciliation
